item.description:
Matthew Good is playing at Brighton music hall Sunday March 4th at Brighton Music hall. Tickets are $18.50 with tax, fees etc included. When I lived in Calgary I used to see him like once a year, would love to check him out if anyone awesome Canadians like to join me! Perhaps beers beforehand. Thoughts? Show starts at 9

 

Let's meet at Whitehorse Tavern at 8 PM for a beer before the show.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canadian Music Meetup: Matthew Good is coming
